settings.teamLogoDescription: Update your team's logo for easier identification

title: Team
approvalFailedDescription: Failed to approve member. Please try again.
membersTabDescription: Here you can manage your team members.
createTeamModalDescription: Create a new team to manage your projects and members.
teamNameDescription: Your team name must be unique and descriptive.
removeMemberErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't remove the selected member.
chooseDifferentRoleError: The role is the same as the current one.
roleMustBeDifferent: The role must be different from the current one.
updateRoleDescription: Choose a role for this member.
transferOwnershipDescription: Transfer ownership of the team to another member.
transferOwnershipInputLabel: Please type TRANSFER to confirm the ownership transfer.
transferOwnershipInputDescription: By transferring ownership, you will no longer be the primary owner of the team.
deleteInvitationDialogDescription: You are about to delete the invitation.
confirmDeletingMemberInvite: You are deleting the invitation to {{ email }}
transferOwnershipDisclaimer: You are transferring ownership of the selected team to {{ member }}.
transferOwnershipError: Sorry, we couldn't transfer ownership to the selected member.
teamLogoInputSubheading: Choose a photo to upload as your team logo.
inviteMembersDescription: Invite members to your team by entering their email and role.
inviteMembersErrorMessage: Sorry, we couldn't invite the members.
pendingInvitesDescription: Here you can manage pending invitations to your team.
loadMembersError: Sorry, we couldn't retrieve your team members.
loadInvitedMembersError: Sorry, we couldn't retrieve your invited team members.
duplicateInviteEmailError: You have already entered this email address
deletingTeamDescription: You are about to delete the team {{ teamName }}.
deleteTeamInputField: Type the team name to confirm.
leavingTeamModalDescription: You are about to leave this team.
leaveTeamDescription: Click the button below to leave the team.
deleteTeamDisclaimer: You are deleting the team {{ teamName }}.
leaveTeamDisclaimer: You are leaving the team {{ teamName }}.
deleteTeamErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't delete your team.
leaveTeamErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't leave your team.
createTeamErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't create your team.
createTeamErrorMessage: We encountered an error creating your team.
transferTeamErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't transfer ownership of your team.
transferTeamErrorMessage: We encountered an error transferring ownership of your team.
updateRoleErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't update the selected member's role.
updateRoleErrorMessage: We encountered an error updating the selected member's role.
inviteNotFoundOrExpiredDescription: The invitation you are looking for has expired or does not exist.
renewInvitationDialogDescription: You are about to renew the invitation to {{ email }}.
renewInvitationErrorTitle: Sorry, we couldn't renew the invitation.
renewInvitationErrorDescription: We encountered an error renewing the invitation.
signInWithDifferentAccount: Sign in with a different account
signInWithDifferentAccountDescription: If you want to accept the invitation with a different account, log out and log in with the account you wish to use.
acceptInvitationDescription: You have been invited to join the team {{accountName}}.
leaveTeamInputLabel: Please type LEAVE to confirm your exit from the team.
leaveTeamInputDescription: By leaving the team, you will no longer have access to it.

plan.message: You have reached the membership limit
